actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to increase the penalty for failure to comply with lobbying disclosure requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 (LDA) to increase from $50,000 to $200,00 the civil fine for noncompliance with LDA disclosure requirements.

titles.title: A bill to increase the penalty for failure to comply with lobbying disclosure requirements.
